title: Obtaining a university degree
description: Receiving her bachelor's degree from the UAQ (Autonomous University of Querétaro)
testimonial: An unforgettable moment of growth and achievement.

title: Entrepreneurship with women
description: First clinic supporting women, boys, and girls of Querétaro—100% Indigenous
testimonial: The beginning of a powerful movement.

title: Developing social programs
description: Creating social programs to support women affected by abuse or family harm, completely free and with support from the government of Querétaro

title: Obtaining a diploma
description: Thanatology diploma and involvement in supporting people who are victims of family loss, through patients and government support.
